1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2015, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing pubsub features as described in XEP-0060
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(pubsub_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   14: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   15: 
   16: -import(pubsub_tools,
   17:         [create_node/3,
   18:          configure_node/4,
   19:          delete_node/3,
   20:          subscribe/3,
   21:          unsubscribe/3,
   22:          publish/4,
   23:          request_all_items/3,
   24:          purge_all_items/3,
   25:          retrieve_user_subscriptions/3,
   26:          retrieve_node_subscriptions/3,
   27:          modify_node_subscriptions/4,
   28:          discover_nodes/3,
   29:          receive_item_notification/4,
   30:          receive_subscription_notification/4,
   31:          receive_node_creation_notification/3,
   32:          receive_subscribe_response/3]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() -> [
   39:           {group, pubsub_tests},
   40:           {group, node_config_tests},
   41:           {group, manage_subscriptions_tests},
   42:           {group, collection_tests},
   43:           {group, collection_config_tests}
   44:          ].
   45: 
   46: groups() -> [{pubsub_tests, [sequence],
   47:               [
   48:                create_delete_node_test,
   49:                discover_nodes_test,
   50:                subscribe_unsubscribe_test,
   51:                publish_test,
   52:                notify_test,
   53:                request_all_items_test,
   54:                purge_all_items_test,
   55:                retrieve_subscriptions_test
   56:               ]
   57:              },
   58:              {node_config_tests, [sequence],
   59:               [
   60:                disable_notifications_test,
   61:                disable_payload_test,
   62:                disable_persist_items_test,
   63:                notify_only_available_users_test,
   64:                send_last_published_item_test
   65:               ]
   66:              },
   67:              {manage_subscriptions_tests, [sequence],
   68:               [
   69:                retrieve_node_subscriptions_test,
   70:                modify_node_subscriptions_test
   71:               ]
   72:              },
   73:              {collection_tests, [sequence],
   74:               [
   75:                create_delete_collection_test,
   76:                subscribe_unsubscribe_collection_test,
   77:                create_delete_leaf_test,
   78:                notify_collection_test,
   79:                notify_collection_leaf_and_item_test,
   80:                notify_collection_bare_jid_test,
   81:                notify_collection_and_leaf_test,
   82:                notify_collection_and_leaf_same_user_test,
   83:                retrieve_subscriptions_collection_test,
   84:                discover_top_level_nodes_test,
   85:                discover_child_nodes_test,
   86:                request_all_items_leaf_test
   87:               ]
   88:              },
   89:              {collection_config_tests, [sequence],
   90:               [
   91:                disable_notifications_leaf_test,
   92:                disable_payload_leaf_test,
   93:                disable_persist_items_leaf_test
   94:               ]
   95:              }
   96:             ].
   97: 
   98: suite() ->
   99:     escalus:suite().
  100: 
  101: -define(NODE_ADDR, <<"pubsub.localhost">>).
  102: -define(NODE_NAME, <<"princely_musings">>).
  103: -define(NODE, {?NODE_ADDR, ?NODE_NAME}).
  104: 
  105: -define(NODE_NAME_2, <<"subpub">>).
  106: -define(NODE_2, {?NODE_ADDR, ?NODE_NAME_2}).
  107: 
  108: -define(DOMAIN, <<"localhost">>).
  109: 
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: %% Init & teardown
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: 
  114: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  115:     escalus:init_per_suite(dynamic_modules:save_modules(?DOMAIN, Config)).
  116: 
  117: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  118:     dynamic_modules:restore_modules(?DOMAIN, Config),
  119:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  120: 
  121: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  122:     dynamic_modules:ensure_modules(?DOMAIN, required_modules()),
  123:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, geralt])),
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  127:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, geralt])),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: init_per_testcase(_TestName, Config) ->
  131:     escalus:init_per_testcase(_TestName, Config).
  132: 
  133: end_per_testcase(_TestName, Config) ->
  134:     escalus:end_per_testcase(_TestName, Config).
  135: 
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: %% Test cases for XEP-0060
  138: %% Comments in test cases refer to sections is the XEP
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: 
  141: create_delete_node_test(Config) ->
  142:     escalus:story(
  143:       Config,
  144:       [{alice, 1}],
  145:       fun(Alice) ->
  146:               %% Request:  8.1.2 Ex.132 create node with (default) open access model
  147:               %% Response:       Ex.134 success
  148:               %%                        Note: contains node ID although XEP does not require this
  149:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  150: 
  151:               %% Request:  8.4.1 Ex.155 owner deletes a node
  152:               %% Response:       Ex.157 success
  153:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  154:       end).
  155: 
  156: discover_nodes_test(Config) ->
  157:     escalus:story(
  158:       Config,
  159:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  160:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  161:               %% Request:  5.2 Ex.9  Entity asks service for all first-level nodes
  162:               %% Response:     Ex.10 Service returns all first-level nodes (empty yet)
  163:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, []),
  164: 
  165:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  166:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME]),
  167: 
  168:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, []),
  169:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME, ?NODE_NAME_2]),
  170: 
  171:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  172:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [])
  173:       end).
  174: 
  175: subscribe_unsubscribe_test(Config) ->
  176:     escalus:story(
  177:       Config,
  178:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  179:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  180:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  181: 
  182:               %% Request:  6.1.1 Ex.32 entity subscribes to a node
  183:               %% Response: 6.1.2 Ex.33 success (with subscription ID)
  184:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  185: 
  186:               %% Request:  6.2.1 Ex.51 unsubscribe from a node
  187:               %% Response: 6.2.2 Ex.52 success
  188:               unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  189: 
  190:               %% Check subscriptions without resources
  191:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  192:               unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  193: 
  194:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  195:       end).
  196: 
  197: publish_test(Config) ->
  198:     escalus:story(
  199:       Config,
  200:       [{alice,1}],
  201:       fun(Alice) ->
  202:               %% Auto-create enabled by default
  203: 
  204:               %% Request:  7.1.1 Ex.99  publish an item with an ItemID
  205:               %% Response: 7.1.2 Ex.100 success
  206:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  207: 
  208:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  209:       end).
  210: 
  211: notify_test(Config) ->
  212:     escalus:story(
  213:       Config,
  214:       [{alice,1}, {bob,2}, {geralt,2}],
  215:       fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2, Geralt1, Geralt2) ->
  216:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  217:               subscribe(Bob1, ?NODE, []),
  218:               subscribe(Geralt1, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  219:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  220: 
  221:               %% 7.1.2.1 Ex.101 notification with payload
  222:               %%                Note: message has type 'headline' by default
  223: 
  224:               %% Bob subscribed with resource
  225:               receive_item_notification(Bob1, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  226:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob2),
  227: 
  228:               %% Geralt subscribed without resource
  229:               receive_item_notification(Geralt1, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  230:               receive_item_notification(Geralt2, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  231: 
  232:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  233:       end).
  234: 
  235: request_all_items_test(Config) ->
  236:     escalus:story(
  237:       Config,
  238:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  239:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  240:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  241:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  242:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  243: 
  244:               %% Request:  6.5.2 Ex.78 subscriber requests all items
  245:               %% Response: 6.5.3 Ex.79 service returns all items
  246:               request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>]}]),
  247:               %% TODO check ordering (although XEP does not specify this)
  248: 
  249:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  250:       end).
  251: 
  252: purge_all_items_test(Config) ->
  253:     escalus:story(
  254:       Config,
  255:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  256:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  257:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  258:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  259:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  260: 
  261:               %% Response: 8.5.3.2 Ex.165 insufficient privileges
  262:               purge_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_error_type, <<"auth">>}]),
  263: 
  264:               request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>]}]),
  265: 
  266:               %% Request:  8.5.1 Ex.161 owner purges all items from node
  267:               %% Response: 8.5.2 Ex.162 success
  268:               purge_all_items(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  269: 
  270:               request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, []}]),
  271: 
  272:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  273:       end).
  274: 
  275: retrieve_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  276:     escalus:story(
  277:       Config,
  278:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  279:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  280:               %% Request:  5.6 Ex.20 Retrieve Subscriptions
  281:               %% Response:     Ex.22 No Subscriptions
  282:               retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [{expected_result, []}]),
  283: 
  284:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  285:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  286: 
  287:               %% Ex. 21 Service returns subscriptions
  288:               Sub = [{?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}],
  289:               retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [{expected_result, Sub}]),
  290: 
  291:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, []),
  292:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE_2, []),
  293: 
  294:               %% Ex. 21 Service returns subscriptions
  295:               Subs = [{?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}, {?NODE_NAME_2, <<"subscribed">>}],
  296:               retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [{expected_result, Subs}]),
  297: 
  298:               %% Owner not subscribed automatically
  299:               retrieve_user_subscriptions(Alice, ?NODE_ADDR, [{expected_result, []}]),
  300: 
  301:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  302:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [])
  303:       end).
  304: 
  305: disable_notifications_test(Config) ->
  306:     escalus:story(
  307:       Config,
  308:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  309:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  310:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_notifications">>, <<"false">>}],
  311:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  312: 
  313:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  314:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  315: 
  316:               %% Notifications disabled
  317:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  318: 
  319:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  320:       end).
  321: 
  322: disable_payload_test(Config) ->
  323:     escalus:story(
  324:       Config,
  325:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  326:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  327:               %% Notification-Only Persistent Node, see 4.3, table 4
  328:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>}],
  329:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  330: 
  331:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  332:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  333: 
  334:               %% Payloads disabled
  335:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, [{with_payload, false}]),
  336: 
  337:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  338:       end).
  339: 
  340: disable_persist_items_test(Config) ->
  341:     escalus:story(
  342:       Config,
  343:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  344:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  345:               %% Payload-Included Transient Node, see 4.3, table 4
  346:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>}],
  347:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  348: 
  349:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  350:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  351: 
  352:               %% Notifications should work
  353:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  354: 
  355:               %% No items should be stored
  356:               request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, []}]),
  357: 
  358:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  359:       end).
  360: 
  361: notify_only_available_users_test(Config) ->
  362:     escalus:story(
  363:       Config,
  364:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  365:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  366:               %% Second node notifies only available users
  367:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  368:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#presence_based_delivery">>, <<"true">>}],
  369:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  370: 
  371:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  372:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE_2, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  373: 
  374:               escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>)),
  375: 
  376:               %% Receive item from node 1 (also make sure the presence is processed)
  377:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  378:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  379: 
  380:               %% Item from node 2 not received (blocked by resource-based delivery)
  381:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE_2, []),
  382:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  383: 
  384:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  385:       end).
  386: 
  387: send_last_published_item_test(Config) ->
  388:     escalus:story(
  389:       Config,
  390:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  391:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  392:               %% Request:  8.1.3 Ex.136 Request a new node with non-default configuration
  393:               %% Response:       Ex.137 Service replies with success
  394:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#send_last_published_item">>, <<"on_sub_and_presence">>}],
  395:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  396: 
  397:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  398:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  399: 
  400:               %% Note: when Bob subscribes, the last item (item2) is sent to him
  401:               %%       6.1.7 Ex.50 service sends last published item
  402:               %%       This is sent BEFORE the response iq stanza
  403:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{receive_response, false}]),
  404:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  405:               receive_subscribe_response(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  406: 
  407:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  408:       end).
  409: 
  410: retrieve_node_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  411:     escalus:story(
  412:       Config,
  413:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  414:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  415:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  416: 
  417:               %% Request:  8.8.1.1 Ex.182 Owner requests all subscriptions
  418:               %% Response: 8.8.1.2 Ex.183 Service returns list of subscriptions (empty yet)
  419:               retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, ?NODE, [{expected_result, []}]),
  420: 
  421:               %% Response: 8.8.1.3 Ex.185 Entity is not an owner
  422:               retrieve_node_subscriptions(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_error_type, <<"auth">>}]),
  423: 
  424:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  425:               subscribe(Geralt, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  426: 
  427:               NodeSubs = [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>}, {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}],
  428:               retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, ?NODE, [{expected_result, NodeSubs}]),
  429: 
  430:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  431:       end).
  432: 
  433: modify_node_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  434:     escalus:story(
  435:       Config,
  436:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  437:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  438:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  439: 
  440:               %% Request:  8.8.2.1 Ex.187 Owner modifies subscriptions
  441:               %% Response: 8.8.2.2 Ex.183 Service responds with success
  442:               modify_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>},
  443:                                                 {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE, []),
  444: 
  445:               %% 8.8.4 Ex.194 Notify subscribers
  446:               receive_subscription_notification(Bob, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE, []),
  447:               receive_subscription_notification(Geralt, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  448: 
  449:               Subs = [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>}, {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}],
  450:               retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, ?NODE, [{expected_result, Subs}]),
  451: 
  452:               %% Response: 8.8.2.3 Ex.190 Entity is not an owner
  453:               modify_node_subscriptions(Bob, [{Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE,
  454:                                         [{expected_error_type, <<"auth">>}]),
  455: 
  456:               %% Remove Bob, add Geralt's full JID
  457:               modify_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"none">>},
  458:                                                 {Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE, []),
  459: 
  460:               receive_subscription_notification(Bob, <<"none">>, ?NODE, []),
  461:               receive_subscription_notification(Geralt, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE, []),
  462: 
  463:               ModSubs = [{Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}, {Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}],
  464:               retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, ?NODE, [{expected_result, ModSubs}]),
  465: 
  466:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  467:       end).
  468: 
  469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: %% Test cases for XEP-0248
  471: %% Comments in test cases refer to sections is the XEP
  472: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  473: 
  474: -define(LEAF_NAME, <<"leaf">>).
  475: -define(LEAF, {?NODE_ADDR, ?LEAF_NAME}).
  476: 
  477: -define(LEAF_NAME_2, <<"leaf2">>).
  478: -define(LEAF_2, {?NODE_ADDR, ?LEAF_NAME_2}).
  479: 
  480: create_delete_collection_test(Config) ->
  481:     escalus:story(
  482:       Config,
  483:       [{alice,1}],
  484:       fun(Alice) ->
  485:               %% Request:  7.1.1 Ex.18 create collection node
  486:               %% Response:       Ex.19 success
  487:               %%                        Note: contains node ID although XEP does not require this
  488:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  489:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  490: 
  491:               %% Request:  7.3.1 Ex.30 delete collection node
  492:               %% Response: 7.3.2 Ex.31 success
  493:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  494:       end).
  495: 
  496: subscribe_unsubscribe_collection_test(Config) ->
  497:     escalus:story(
  498:       Config,
  499:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  500:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  501:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  502:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  503: 
  504:               %% Request:  6.1.1 Ex.10 subscribe (no configuration)
  505:               %% Response: 6.1.2 Ex.12 success
  506:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  507: 
  508:               %% Same as XEP-0060
  509:               unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  510: 
  511:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  512:       end).
  513: 
  514: create_delete_leaf_test(Config) ->
  515:     escalus:story(
  516:       Config,
  517:       [{alice,1}],
  518:       fun(Alice) ->
  519:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  520:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  521: 
  522:               %% XEP-0060, 8.1.2, see 16.4.4 for config details
  523:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  524:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  525: 
  526:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  527:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  528:       end).
  529: 
  530: notify_collection_test(Config) ->
  531:     escalus:story(
  532:       Config,
  533:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  534:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  535:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  536:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  537: 
  538:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  539:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  540:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  541:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  542: 
  543:               %% Publish to leaf nodes, Bob should get notifications
  544:               %% 5.3.1.1 Ex.5 Subscriber receives a publish notification from a collection
  545:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  546:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  547:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  548:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  549: 
  550:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  551:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  552:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  553:       end).
  554: 
  555: notify_collection_leaf_and_item_test(Config) ->
  556:     escalus:story(
  557:       Config,
  558:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  559:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  560:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  561:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  562: 
  563:               %% Subscribe before creating the leaf node
  564:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  565:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  566:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  567: 
  568:               %% Bob should get a notification for the leaf node creation
  569:               %% 5.3.1.2 Ex.6 Subscriber receives a creation notification from a collection
  570:               receive_node_creation_notification(Bob, ?LEAF, []),
  571: 
  572:               %% Publish to leaf node, Bob should get notified
  573:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  574:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  575: 
  576:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  577:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  578:       end).
  579: 
  580: notify_collection_bare_jid_test(Config) ->
  581:     escalus:story(
  582:       Config,
  583:       [{alice,1}, {bob,2}, {geralt,2}],
  584:       fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2, Geralt1, Geralt2) ->
  585:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  586:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  587: 
  588:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  589:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  590:               subscribe(Bob1, ?NODE, []),
  591:               subscribe(Geralt1, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  592:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  593: 
  594:               %% Bob subscribed with resource
  595:               receive_item_notification(Bob1, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  596:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob2),
  597: 
  598:               %% Geralt subscribed without resource
  599:               receive_item_notification(Geralt1, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  600:               receive_item_notification(Geralt2, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  601: 
  602:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  603:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  604:       end).
  605: 
  606: notify_collection_and_leaf_test(Config) ->
  607:     escalus:story(
  608:       Config,
  609:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  610:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  611:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  612:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  613: 
  614:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  615:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  616:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  617:               subscribe(Geralt, ?LEAF, []),
  618: 
  619:               %% Publish to leaf nodes, Bob and Geralt should get notifications
  620:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  621:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  622:               receive_item_notification(Geralt, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  623: 
  624:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  625:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  626:       end).
  627: 
  628: notify_collection_and_leaf_same_user_test(Config) ->
  629:     escalus:story(
  630:       Config,
  631:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  632:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  633:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  634:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  635: 
  636:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  637:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  638:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  639:               subscribe(Bob, ?LEAF, []),
  640: 
  641:               %% Bob should get only one notification
  642:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  643:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  644:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  645: 
  646:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  647:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  648:       end).
  649: 
  650: retrieve_subscriptions_collection_test(Config) ->
  651:     escalus:story(
  652:       Config,
  653:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  654:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  655:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  656:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  657: 
  658:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  659:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  660:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  661:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  662:               subscribe(Bob, ?LEAF, []),
  663: 
  664:               % Only the nodes for which subscriptions were made should be returned
  665:               Subs = [{?LEAF_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}, {?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}],
  666:               retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [{expected_result, Subs}]),
  667: 
  668:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  669:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  670:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  671:       end).
  672: 
  673: discover_top_level_nodes_test(Config) ->
  674:     escalus:story(
  675:       Config,
  676:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  677:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  678:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  679:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  680: 
  681:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  682:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  683: 
  684:               %% Discover top-level nodes, only the collection expected
  685:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME]),
  686: 
  687:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  688:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  689:       end).
  690: 
  691: discover_child_nodes_test(Config) ->
  692:     escalus:story(
  693:       Config,
  694:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  695:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  696:               %% Try to get children of a non-existing node
  697:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_error_type, <<"cancel">>}]),
  698: 
  699:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  700:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  701: 
  702:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  703: 
  704:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  705:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  706:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  707: 
  708:               %% Request:  5.2.1 Ex.11 Entity requests child nodes
  709:               %% Response: 5.2.2 Ex.12 Service returns child nodes
  710:               discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, [?LEAF_NAME, ?LEAF_NAME_2]),
  711: 
  712:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  713:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  714:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  715:       end).
  716: 
  717: request_all_items_leaf_test(Config) ->
  718:     escalus:story(
  719:       Config,
  720:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  721:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  722:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  723:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  724: 
  725:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  726:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  727:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  728: 
  729:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  730:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  731: 
  732:               %% Request items from leaf nodes - as described in XEP-0060
  733:               request_all_items(Bob, ?LEAF, [{expected_result, [<<"item1">>]}]),
  734:               request_all_items(Bob, ?LEAF_2, [{expected_result, [<<"item2">>]}]),
  735: 
  736:               %% NOTE: This is not implemented yet
  737:               %% Request:  6.2.1 Ex.15 Subscriber requests all items on a collection
  738:               %% Response: 6.2.2 Ex.16 Service returns items on leaf nodes
  739:               %%request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>]}]),
  740: 
  741:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  742:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  743:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  744:       end).
  745: 
  746: disable_notifications_leaf_test(Config) ->
  747:     escalus:story(
  748:       Config,
  749:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  750:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  751:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  752:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  753: 
  754:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_notifications">>, <<"false">>},
  755:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  756:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  757: 
  758:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  759:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  760: 
  761:               %% Notifications disabled
  762:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  763: 
  764:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  765:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  766:       end).
  767: 
  768: disable_payload_leaf_test(Config) ->
  769:     escalus:story(
  770:       Config,
  771:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  772:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  773:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  774:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  775: 
  776:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>},
  777:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  778:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  779: 
  780:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  781:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  782: 
  783:               %% Payloads disabled
  784:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, [{with_payload, false}]),
  785: 
  786:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  787:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  788:       end).
  789: 
  790: disable_persist_items_leaf_test(Config) ->
  791:     escalus:story(
  792:       Config,
  793:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  794:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  795:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  796:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  797: 
  798:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>},
  799:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  800:               create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  801: 
  802:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  803:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  804: 
  805:               %% Notifications should work
  806:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  807: 
  808:               %% No items should be stored
  809:               request_all_items(Bob, ?LEAF, [{expected_result, []}]),
  810: 
  811:               delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  812:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  813:       end).
  814: 
  815: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  816: %% Tests for features unsupported by ejabberd
  817: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  818: 
  819: disable_payload_and_persist_test(Config) ->
  820:     escalus:story(
  821:       Config,
  822:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  823:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  824:               %% Notification-Only Transient Node, see 4.3, table 4
  825:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>},
  826:                             {<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>}],
  827:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  828: 
  829:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  830: 
  831:               %% Response  7.1.3 Ex.112 attempt to publish payload to transient notification node
  832:               %%                   Expected error of type 'modify'
  833:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, [{expected_error_type, <<"modify">>}]),
  834: 
  835:               %% Publish without payload should succeed
  836:               publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, [{with_payload, false}]),
  837: 
  838:               %% Notifications should work
  839:               receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  840: 
  841:               %% No items should be stored
  842:               request_all_items(Bob, ?NODE, [{expected_result, []}]),
  843: 
  844:               %% No more notifications
  845:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  846: 
  847:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  848:       end).
  849: 
  850: disable_delivery_test(Config) ->
  851:     escalus:story(
  852:       Config,
  853:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  854:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  855:               create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  856: 
  857:               %% Request: 6.3.7 Ex.71 Subscribe and configure
  858:               %%                Ex.72 Success
  859:               SubscrConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver">>, <<"false">>}],
  860:               subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{config, SubscrConfig}]),
  861: 
  862:               publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  863: 
  864:               %% Notifications disabled
  865:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  866: 
  867:               delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  868:       end).
  869: 
  870: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  871: %% Helpers
  872: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  873: 
  874: required_modules() ->
  875:     [{mod_pubsub, [
  876:                    {plugins,[<<"dag">>]},
  877:                    {nodetree,<<"dag">>}
  878:                   ]}].
